title: Kath & Kim: series 3 [DVD]
brief_description: Third series in this hilarious satire about a middle class family living out their dreams in suburbia, continues the story of Kath and Kel, Kim and Brett, Epponnee and second best friend, Sharon. Episode 1: Kath has mixed feelings about the return of Kim’s Dad. Kim experiences the joys of motherhood. Episode 2: The ladies hit the races. Episode 3: Brett has a family crisis; Kath and Kel spread their (social) wings. Episode 4: Kim plans to shed the pounds. Episode 5: Sharon has a hot date; Kath becomes addicted to TV. Episode 6: Kath and Kim consider new career paths. Episode 7: Birthday celebrations create chaos in the Day-Knight household. Episode 8: A peak into the future for the residents of Lagoon Court. Special guest appearance by Kylie Minogue. Created and written by Gina Riley and Jane Turner.
